entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023
